value.title: Ai Weiwei Traces a Century of Making Authorities Squirm
value.excerpt: A new memoir by world-famous artist-provocateur Ai Weiwei, “1000 Years of Joys and Sorrows,” traces a century of his family’s ups and downs with authorities; it’s being published in more than 20 countries—though not China.

value.title: Labor shortages outrank cyber threats as biggest concern for tech companies
value.excerpt: 57% of tech executives responding to CNBC's Technology Executive Council survey said finding qualified employees is the biggest concern for their company right now. Respondents ranked it higher than supply chain issues and cyber security threats.
